title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials The NPS is committed to the nation's youngest citizens and future stewards. Excite your students with a change of scenery, and let Ninety Six NHS be your classroom. We have a wide array of materials to explore the battle and the Revolutionary War. A field trip to the park gives students a chance to form their own intellectual and emotional connections to our shared cultural heritage. All Curriculum Materials
